item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://localhost/techsavvy-wordpress.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Founders

Nathan Tremaine

FOUNDER & CEO

About Us

Our Mission

At Techsavvy, our mission is simple: to provide cutting-edge IT solutions that empower businesses to achieve their goals. We believe in the transformative power of technology and are dedicated to making it accessible and beneficial to all our clients.

Our Services

We offer a comprehensive range of IT services tailored to meet the unique needs of each client. Our expertise includes:

  • IT Services: Comprehensive support and management of your IT infrastructure to keep your business running smoothly.
  • Cybersecurity: Proactive measures and strategies to protect your business from cyber threats.
  • Cloud & Backup: Scalable and secure cloud services to enhance your business operations and ensure data safety.
  • Hardware Repair/Installation: Expert repair and installation services to keep your hardware functioning optimally.
  • Help Desk: Reliable support for all your IT-related queries and issues, ensuring minimal downtime.

Our Team

Our team is our greatest asset. Comprised of highly skilled and certified IT professionals, we bring a wealth of knowledge and experience to every project. We are passionate about technology and committed to delivering solutions that drive success for our clients.

Our Values

At Techsavvy, we operate on a foundation of strong core values:

  • Integrity: We believe in honesty and transparency in all our interactions.
  • Innovation: We stay ahead of the curve by embracing the latest technological advancements.
  • Customer Focus: We prioritize our clients' needs and work diligently to exceed their expectations.
  • Excellence: We strive for the highest standards in everything we do.

Thank you for considering Techsavvy as your IT partner. We look forward to working with you and helping your business achieve new heights.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Contact Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
How Can We Help You?

At Techsavvy, were dedicated to providing top-notch IT services and solutions tailored to meet your unique needs. Whether youre facing a tech challenge, looking to upgrade your systems, or need expert advice, were here to help!

Simply click the button below to send us a message or call us at 318-884-0844. Our team of experienced professionals is ready to provide the support and solutions you need.

Email Us Today

Schedule a Consultation Call

At Techsavvy, we understand that every business has unique IT needs. Thats why we offer personalized consultation calls to discuss your specific requirements and tailor our solutions to fit your goals.

What to Expect

During your consultation call, youll get:

  • Expert Advice: Speak directly with our experienced IT professionals who can provide insights and recommendations based on your needs.
  • Customized Solutions: Learn how our services can be tailored to help you achieve your business objectives.
  • Clear Action Plan: Get a step-by-step plan outlining how we can support your IT infrastructure and enhance your operations.
Schedule Consultation Call

Join Our Team

At Techsavvy, we're always on the lookout for talented and passionate individuals to join our team. Located in West Monroe, Louisiana, we pride ourselves on fostering a collaborative and innovative work environment where you can thrive and make a real impact.

Why Work with Us?

Growth Opportunities: We believe in continuous learning and provide ample opportunities for professional development.

Collaborative Environment: Join a team of dedicated professionals who support and inspire each other.

Community Focus: Be part of a company that values giving back to the community and making a positive impact.

item.title: IT Services
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
IT Services

Welcome to Techsavvy, your trusted partner for comprehensive IT services. We understand that technology is the backbone of modern businesses, and our mission is to provide you with the tools and support you need to succeed.

What We Offer

At Techsavvy, we offer a wide range of IT services designed to meet the unique needs of your business. Our expert team is here to ensure your technology runs smoothly, securely, and efficiently.

Managed IT Services

Our managed IT services act as an extension of your team, providing 24/7 monitoring and support to keep your systems running at their best. We handle everything from routine maintenance to proactive problem solving, allowing you to focus on your core business.

  • Proactive Monitoring
  • Regular Maintenance
  • Remote and On-Site Support
  • IT Infrastructure Management
Cybersecurity

Protecting your business from cyber threats is our top priority. Our cybersecurity services include comprehensive strategies to safeguard your data and systems from potential attacks.

  • Threat Detection and Response
  • Firewall and Antivirus Solutions
  • Security Audits and Compliance
  • Data Encryption and Backup
Cloud & Backup Solutions

Harness the power of the cloud with our scalable and secure cloud services. We provide reliable backup solutions to ensure your data is always safe and accessible.

  • Cloud Storage and Computing
  • Disaster Recovery Planning
  • Off-Site Data Backup
  • Secure File Sharing
Hardware Repair & Installation

From setting up new equipment to repairing existing hardware, our skilled technicians are here to help. We ensure your devices are installed correctly and function optimally.

  • Device Setup and Configuration
  • Hardware Troubleshooting and Repair
  • Network Installation and Cabling
  • Peripheral Installation
Help Desk Support

Our help desk support services provide fast and reliable assistance for all your IT-related queries and issues. We are just a call or click away, ready to resolve your problems promptly.

  • Remote Support
  • On-Site Assistance
  • Troubleshooting and Resolution
  • User Training and Documentation

item.title: Cyber Security
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Don't Have a Help Desk?

Get live IT support services in West Monroe, Monroe, LA or neighboring areas

When your team runs into technology issues, who do they call? Do they ask you to take time out of your busy day to sort it out, or do they try to figure out a solution by themselves? This takes important focus away from their work.

You can turn to Tech Savvy, LLC for live IT support services in the West Monroe and Monroe, LA area. Your team will always have a local person to contact with any tech support issues, questions or concerns.

You can also look to us for on-site or remote IT services. To get live IT support services when you need them, call 318-884-0844 right away.

Find out about our additional services

Our team draws from almost a decade of experience to provide a variety of services. We can:

  • Install an antivirus system
  • Manage and maintain a firewall
  • Recover and back up data affected by ransomware
  • Set up two-factor authentication

Reach out to us now to find out more about any of these options. You can also call us to discuss on-site or remote IT services.

  • AI Anti Virus
  • Customer Access Management
  • Email Protection

item.title: Cloud & Backup
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Store and Share Your Data With Ease

Ask about our Microsoft 365 IT support in the West Monroe & Monroe, LA area

Need to store your documents, spreadsheets or images somewhere accessible? You can use Microsoft 365 and a variety of other tools to store these types of information in the cloud. This makes it easier to share them among your team, allowing for more flexible, accessible collaboration on shared documents.

Tech Savvy, LLC offers Microsoft 365 IT support to help you get started in West Monroe, Monroe, LA or any surrounding area. We can also provide:

  • Azure Active Directory IT support
  • GSuite IT support
  • Google Classroom IT support
  • GoGuardian IT support
  • QuickBooks IT support

No matter the business, we'll be happy to help you use the cloud to your advantage. Call 318-884-0844 now to find out more about Microsoft 365 support and other options.

Switching to Windows 365?

Microsoft 365 is only one part of the Windows 365 suite, a broader collection of tools for your organization. If you're upgrading to Windows 365 from another system, we can provide support for this as well as Microsoft 365 IT support. Contact us now to talk to a local IT professional.

Reach out to inquire more about our services:

  • Backup Cloud Service (workstations and servers)
  • Backup Cloud Documents
  • Email Backup
  • Onsite Backup - NAS

item.title: Hardware Repair / Installation
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Take Advantage of New Hardware

Book our hardware installation services in the West Monroe, LA area

Integrating new hardware into your network can be complicated. Luckily, the professionals at Tech Savvy, LLC can make sure that your new hardware is installed properly, without risking accidental damage. This way, you can spend more of your time doing what's important to you.

For hardware installation services, turn to Tech Savvy. Our company can:

  • Install hardware
  • Repair hardware
  • Install document cameras

Whether you're using these technological devices to create a smart business environment or support presentations in a conference room, you can count on our team. Contact us now to plan hardware installation services in West Monroe, Monroe, LA, and surrounding areas.

Solve your hardware problem

Maybe your overhead camera isn't capturing an image exactly how it should, or your smartboard pens make broken lines instead of smooth ones. We can get to the bottom of the problem and provide hardware repair services. Call 318-884-0844 right away to discuss the problem with a professional. We'll schedule hardware repair services at your convenience.

item.title: Help Desk
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Help Desk Support

At Techsavvy, we understand that timely and reliable support is crucial for the smooth operation of your business. Our Help Desk services are designed to provide you with quick and efficient solutions to all your IT-related issues, ensuring minimal downtime and maximum productivity.

What We Offer

Our Help Desk support is your first line of defense against IT problems. Whether you need assistance with troubleshooting, software installations, or user training, our team is here to help.

Remote Support

Experience the convenience of our remote support services, allowing us to resolve your IT issues without the need for an on-site visit. Our technicians can securely access your systems to diagnose and fix problems quickly.

  • Immediate Assistance: Get help right when you need it.
  • Secure Remote Access: We ensure your data remains safe during remote sessions.
  • Cost-Effective Solutions: Save time and resources with our efficient remote support.
On-Site Assistance

For issues that require a personal touch, our on-site support services bring our experts directly to your location. We handle everything from hardware repairs to network troubleshooting, ensuring your systems are up and running in no time.

  • Prompt Visits: Our technicians arrive promptly to address your concerns.
  • Comprehensive Solutions: We tackle hardware, software, and network issues.
  • Professional Service: Count on our friendly and knowledgeable staff.
Troubleshooting and Resolution

Our Help Desk team is skilled in identifying and resolving a wide range of IT issues. We use advanced diagnostic tools and techniques to get to the root of the problem and implement effective solutions.

  • Problem Diagnosis: Accurate identification of IT issues.
  • Effective Solutions: Fast and reliable problem resolution.
  • User Support: Assistance with software, hardware, and network problems.
User Training and Documentation

We believe in empowering our clients with the knowledge they need to utilize their technology effectively. Our training sessions and comprehensive documentation help your team get the most out of your IT investments.

  • Customized Training: Tailored sessions to fit your needs.
  • Comprehensive Guides: Easy-to-follow documentation for all users.
  • Ongoing Support: Continued assistance to ensure your team stays confident and capable.
